name: DDIVS

attributes.documentation:
Definition of contract accepting Double Divs (DDIVS) tokens
Games or any other innovative platforms can reuse this contract to support Double Divs (DDIVS) tokens
attributes.name: AcceptsDDIVS
tokenFallback

attributes.documentation: Converts all incoming ethereum to tokens for the caller, and passes down the referral addy (if any)
attributes.name: buy

attributes.documentation:
Fallback function to handle ethereum that was send straight to the contract
Unfortunately we cannot use a referral address this way.

Sends FUND money to the Dev Fee Contract
The address is here https://etherscan.io/address/0x85EcbC22e9c0Ad0c1Cb3F4465582493bADc50433
attributes.name: payFund

attributes.documentation: Converts all of caller's dividends to tokens.
attributes.name: reinvest

attributes.documentation: Alias of sell() and withdraw().
attributes.name: exit

attributes.documentation: Withdraws all of the callers earnings.
attributes.name: withdraw

attributes.documentation: Liquifies tokens to ethereum.
attributes.name: sell

attributes.documentation:
Transfer tokens from the caller to a new holder.
REMEMBER THIS IS 0% TRANSFER FEE
attributes.name: transfer
transferAndCall

attributes.documentation:
Additional check that the game address we are sending tokens to is a contract
assemble the given address bytecode. If bytecode exists then the _addr is a contract.
attributes.name: isContract

attributes.documentation: In case one of us dies, we need to replace ourselves.
attributes.name: setAdministrator

attributes.documentation: Precautionary measures in case we need to adjust the masternode rate.
attributes.name: setStakingRequirement

attributes.documentation: Add or remove game contract, which can accept Double Divs (DDIVS) tokens
attributes.name: setCanAcceptTokens

attributes.documentation: If we want to rebrand, we can.
attributes.name: setName

attributes.documentation: If we want to rebrand, we can.
attributes.name: setSymbol

attributes.documentation:
Method to view the current Ethereum stored in the contract
Example: totalEthereumBalance()
attributes.name: totalEthereumBalance

attributes.documentation: Retrieve the total token supply.
attributes.name: totalSupply

attributes.documentation: Retrieve the tokens owned by the caller.
attributes.name: myTokens

attributes.documentation:
Retrieve the dividends owned by the caller.
If `_includeReferralBonus` is to to 1/true, the referral bonus will be included in the calculations.
The reason for this, is that in the frontend, we will want to get the total divs (global + ref)
But in the internal calculations, we want them separate.
attributes.name: myDividends

attributes.documentation: Retrieve the token balance of any single address.
attributes.name: balanceOf

attributes.documentation: Retrieve the dividend balance of any single address.
attributes.name: dividendsOf

attributes.documentation: Return the buy price of 1 individual token.
attributes.name: sellPrice

attributes.documentation: Return the sell price of 1 individual token.
attributes.name: buyPrice

attributes.documentation: Function for the frontend to dynamically retrieve the price scaling of buy orders.
attributes.name: calculateTokensReceived

attributes.documentation: Function for the frontend to dynamically retrieve the price scaling of sell orders.
attributes.name: calculateEthereumReceived

attributes.documentation: Function for the frontend to show ether waiting to be send to fund in contract
attributes.name: etherToSendFund
ethereumToTokens_
tokensToEthereum_

attributes.documentation:
@title SafeMath
@dev Math operations with safety checks that throw on error
attributes.name: SafeMath

attributes.documentation: @dev Multiplies two numbers, throws on overflow.
attributes.name: mul

attributes.documentation: @dev Integer division of two numbers, truncating the quotient.
attributes.name: div

attributes.documentation: @dev Substracts two numbers, throws on overflow (i.e. if subtrahend is greater than minuend).
attributes.name: sub

attributes.documentation: @dev Adds two numbers, throws on overflow.
attributes.name: add
